template.value: display: inline-block; border-bottom: $height$ solid $color$; /* 100px / 200px*100px */ border-left: $quarterWidth$ solid transparent; /* 50px / 200px*100px */ border-right: $quarterWidth$ solid transparent; /* 50px / 200px*100px */ height: 0; width: $halfWidth$; /* 100px / 200px*100px */ vertical-align: middle;$END$
